name: Ailin Werner
bio:
Automation enthusiast on a mission to help others master fair-code workflows. I believe a well-built automation is a work of art.

I specialize in multi-agent systems and complex technical logic. Currently working toward becoming an official n8n Ambassador and contributing to the open-source community. Always open to collaborating on templates that solve real-world architectural challenges. Let's chat if you're building something unconventional.
